content.title: Suture-Mediated Vascular Closure Devices
content.description: Devices that deploy sutures to close arteriotomies percutaneously, allowing immediate hemostasis and ambulation.
content.mechanism: Needle-based systems place sutures around arteriotomy edges, which are tied extravascularly to achieve closure

Perclose_ProGlide.sizing: Up to 8Fr single, larger with pre-close technique

pre_close_technique.method: Deploy devices BEFORE large sheath placement
pre_close_technique.number: Two devices at 10 and 2 o'clock for up to 18Fr; additional for larger
pre_close_technique.closure: Tie sutures at end of procedure
